text: Stavropol Krai (Russian: Ставропо́льский край) is a federal subject (a krai) of Russia. It is in the North Caucasus region in Southern Russia, and is part of the North Caucasian Federal District. Stavropol Krai has a population of 2,786,281. The administrative center is the city of Stavropol. Category:Stavropol Krai
title: Stavropol Krai
